text: Back to School is a 1986 American comedy movie directed by Alan Matter, produced by Chuck Russell and stars Rodney Dangerfield, Keith Gordon, Sally Kellerman, Burt Young, Terry Farrell and Robert Downey Jr.. It was distributed by Orion Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1986 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Alan Matter Category:Movies set in Wisconsin
title: Back to School
